title: Iron hasta

properties.name: description
properties.value: The iron hasta is a one-handed melee weapon, similar to the spear. To wield this weapon, players need to have completed Barbarian Training in Smithing. Although hastae offer negative defensive bonuses, the fact that they can be used with a shield or defender provides more defence than a normal spear. To obtain an iron hasta the player can either create one using the Smithing skill or trade with another player. It can be poisoned.

The iron hasta is a one-handed melee weapon, similar to the spear. To wield this weapon, players need to have completed Barbarian Training in Smithing. Although hastae offer negative defensive bonuses, the fact that they can be used with a shield or defender provides more defence than a normal spear. To obtain an iron hasta the player can either create one using the Smithing skill or trade with another player. It can be poisoned.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
7 July 2021
(update)

The position of the weapon and its variants on female players has been adjusted so that they appear to be equipped properly.

21 April 2021
(update)

The hasta's attack speed has been decreased from 5 (every 3.0 seconds) to 4 (every 2.4 seconds).

The '''iron hasta''' is a one-handed [[melee]] [[weapon]], similar to the [[spear]]. To wield this weapon, players need to have completed [[Barbarian Training]] in [[Smithing]]. Although hastae offer negative defensive bonuses, the fact that they can be used with a [[shield]] or [[defender]] provides more defence than a normal spear. To obtain an iron hasta the player can either create one using the [[Smithing]] skill or trade with another player. It can be [[poison]]ed.
